name: Vaccine Blocks
description:
This game is supposed to be played on mobile devices. PC experience is limited, play in fullscreen mode for the best experience.

How to play?
Place shapes on board to fill rows/columns. For each block placed and filled row/column you get points, complete more rows/columns at the same time to get more points! Try to last as long as possible and beat your highscores.

Best known highscore 1986 by KoRrNiK_, try to beat it.
